metadata.titleEn: Whole rock and single mineral geochemical data of granite in Yingwuling W-Sn deposit, Yangchun Basin
metadata.titleCn: 阳春盆地鹦鹉岭W-Sn矿花岗岩全岩及单矿物地球化学数据
metadata.description: The data are the whole rock major and trace element, Sr-Nd isotopic data, zircon in-situ U-Pb isotopic dating, Hf isotopic composition and trace element data, and cassiterite in-situ U-Pb isotopic dating of the Yingwuling deposit granite in Yangchun basin, Guangdong Province. The whole rock samples are granite from Yingwuling deposit, including K-feldspar granite and biotite granite. Zircon is selected from  K-feldspar granite and biotite granite, cassiterite is selected from weathered ore bearing granite. The major and trace elements of whole rock are obtained by XRF and ICP-MS analysis, respectively，the F content is obtained by ion electrode analysis, and the Cl content is obtained by ion chromatography analysis, and the Sr-Nd isotopic composition is obtained by MC-ICP-MS analysis. In situ U-Pb ages and trace elements of zircon and in situ U-Pb ages of cassiterite were obtained by LA-ICP-MS. In situ Hf isotopic compositions of zircons were obtained by LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis. The above data have been published in high-level SCI journals (Ore Geology Reviews), and the data are true and reliable. The petrogenesis of the Yingwuling pluton and the relationship between granite magmatism and W-Sn mineralization can be discussed based on the data obtained.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为广东阳春盆地鹦鹉岭矿床花岗岩的全岩主量、微量元素，Sr-Nd同位素数据，以及锆石原位U-Pb同位素定年、Hf同位素组成和微量元素数据，以及锡石原位U-Pb同位素定年数据。全岩样品为采自鹦鹉岭矿床的花岗岩，包括钾长石花岗岩和黑云母花岗岩。锆石单矿物选自钾长石花岗岩和黑云母花岗岩，锡石选自风化的含矿花岗岩。全岩的主量、微量元素分别由XRF、ICP-MS分析获得，F含量由离子电极分析获得，Cl含量由离子色谱分析获得，Sr-Nd同位素组成由MC-ICP-MS分析获得。锆石原位U-Pb年龄、微量元素数据及锡石的U-Pb年龄数据均由LA-ICP-MS分析获得。锆石原位Hf同位素组成由LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得。以上数据已发表于高级别SCI期刊（Ore Geology Reviews），数据真实可靠。通过获得的数据可以讨论鹦鹉岭岩体的岩石成因及花岗岩岩浆作用与钨锡成矿作用的关系。
metadata.instructions: The data is stored in Excel file that can be opened directly in Excel workbook. The file named "WR_MajTra" represents the data of major and trace elements of the whole rock, "WR_SrNd" represents the Sr-Nd isotopic composition of the whole rock. "Zrn_Tra" represents in-situ trace element geochemical data of zircon, "Zrn_UPb" represents zircon in-situ U-Pb age data, "Zrn_Hf" represents the in-situ Hf isotopic composition of zircons. "Cst_UPb" represents in situ U-Pb age data of cassiterite.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据以Excel文件存储，可直接使用Excel工作薄打开。名称为“WR_MajTra”的文件代表全岩主量、微量元素数据，“WR_SrNd”代表全岩的Sr-Nd同位素组成数据。“Zrn_Tra”代表锆石的原位微量元素地球化学数据，“Zrn_UPb”代表锆石原位U-Pb年龄数据，“Zrn_Hf”代表锆石原位Hf同位素组成。“Cst_UPb”代表锡石的原位U-Pb年龄数据。

authorList.unitCn: 中国科学院海洋研究所

literatureList.titleEn: Late Cretaceous granitic magmatism and mineralization in the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit, South China: Constraints from zircon and cassiterite U–Pb geochronology and whole-rock geochemistry.
literatureList.referenceEn: Zhang, L., Zhang, R., Wu, K., Chen, Y., Li, C., Hu, Y., ... & Sun, W. (2018). Late Cretaceous granitic magmatism and mineralization in the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit, South China: Constraints from zircon and cassiterite U–Pb geochronology and whole-rock geochemistry. Ore Geology Reviews, 96, 115-129.

background: Numerous Late Cretaceous W–Sn deposits associated with granitic rocks were developed in the southern part of South China. However, the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization and tectonic setting remains disputed. A large number of non-ferrous metal deposits, especially W–Sn deposits, occurred in the Mesozoic in South China, accounting for more than 50 % and 20 % of world’s total W and Sn reserves, respectively. These W–Sn deposits are usually related to granitic magmatic activity and are mainly generated in the Middle Jurassic and Late Cretaceous. The Yingwuling W–Sn polymetallic deposit is located in the western part of the Yangchun basin, the southernmost part of South China. South China is composed of the Cathaysia block to the southeast and the Yangtze block to the northwest. The Yingwuling W–Sn polymetallic deposit is situated in the southwest part of the Yangchun basin. The Yingwuling pluton intruded into the Upper Devonian strata, resulting in extensive skarn. The Yingwuling pluton shows A-type granite affinity, indicating that it was formed in an extensional environment.
research objective: In this study, we present zircon and cassiterite U–Pb ages, whole-rock geochemistry (major and trace elements and Sr–Nd isotopes) and zircon Hf isotopes, aiming at a better understanding of the petrogenesis of the Yingwuling pluton and the relationship between granitic magmatism and W–Sn mineralization. This study suggests that the subduction of the Neo-Tethys plate should be responsible for the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit in the Late Cretaceous.
challenges: The relationship among granitic magma, mineralization and tectonic setting remains disputed. The petrogenesis and metallogenic process remain controversial. The tectonic environment needs to be revisited. The controlling factors of the metallogenic process are still unclear due to the lack of detailed geochemical constraints.
methods: In this study, six fresh granitoid samples were collected from outcrops and drill holes, and then smashed to small fragments before crushed to 200 meshes. Zircon U–Pb dating was conducted for two K-feldspar granite samples (YWL06 and YWL10), two biotite granite samples (YWL11 and YWL1506) and two weathered ore-bearing granite residue samples (YWL1503 and YWL1504) from the Yingwuling pluton. Cassiterite U–Pb isotopic analyses were performed on smooth domains with no cracks. Cassiterite U–Pb dating was carried out using the same LA-ICP-MS instrument as zircon U–Pb dating at the Key Laboratory of Mineralogy and Metallogeny, GIG-CAS.
findings: Three-type granites in the Yingwuling deposit, including the K-feldspar granite, biotite granite and weathered ore-bearing granite residue, defined an emplacement age of ∼79 Ma. This age agrees well with the mineralization age of 79.6 ± 0.9 Ma obtained using cassiterite U–Pb dating, suggesting a genetic link between granitic magmatism and W–Sn mineralization. The Yingwuling pluton shows A-type granite affinity, and is further classified as A2-type granite. Combined with previous studies on magmatic rocks and tectonic activities during Late Cretaceous in South China, this study suggests that the subduction of Neo-Tethys plate should be responsible for the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit in the Late Cretaceous.
backgroundCn: 南中国南部发育了许多与花岗岩岩石相关的晚白垩纪钨-锡矿床。然而，花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用与构造背景之间的关系仍然存在争议。在南中国，尤其是在中生代，出现了大量的非铁金属矿床，钨-锡矿床占全球钨和锡储量的50%以上和20%以上。这些钨-锡矿床通常与花岗岩岩浆活动有关，主要形成于中侏罗世和晚白垩纪。英武岭钨-锡多金属矿床位于阳春盆地的西部，南中国的最南端。南中国由东南的华南块和西北的扬子块组成。英武岭钨-锡多金属矿床位于阳春盆地的西南部。英武岭岩体侵入上泥盆纪地层，导致广泛的变质岩（角岩）形成。英武岭岩体显示出A型花岗岩的亲和性，表明它是在一个伸展环境中形成的。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了锆石和锡石的U-Pb年龄、全岩地球化学（主要和微量元素以及Sr-Nd同位素）和锆石Hf同位素，旨在更好地理解鹰乌岭岩体的成因及花岗岩岩浆活动与钨锡矿化之间的关系。本研究表明，晚白垩世时期，新特提斯板块的俯冲应是导致鹰乌岭钨锡矿床形成的原因。
challengesCn: 花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用和构造背景之间的关系仍然存在争议。岩石成因和成矿过程仍然存在争论。构造环境需要重新审视。由于缺乏详细的地球化学约束，成矿过程的控制因素仍不清楚。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，从露头和钻孔中收集了六个新鲜的花岗岩样品，然后将其破碎成小碎片，再粉碎至200目。对来自鹰乌岭岩体的两个钾长石花岗岩样品（YWL06和YWL10）、两个黑云母花岗岩样品（YWL11和YWL1506）以及两个风化含矿花岗岩残留样品（YWL1503和YWL1504）进行了锆石U-Pb定年。对无裂缝的光滑区域进行了锡石U-Pb同位素分析。锡石U-Pb定年使用与锆石U-Pb定年相同的激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（LA-ICP-MS），在中国科学院地质与地球物理研究所矿物学与成矿学重点实验室进行。
findingsCn: 在英武岭矿床中，三种类型的花岗岩，包括钾长石花岗岩、黑云母花岗岩和风化的含矿花岗岩残留，确定了约79百万年的成岩年龄。这个年龄与通过锡石U-Pb定年获得的79.6 ± 0.9百万年的矿化年龄非常吻合，表明花岗岩岩浆活动与锡-钨矿化之间存在遗传联系。英武岭岩体显示出A型花岗岩的亲和性，进一步被分类为A2型花岗岩。结合对南中国晚白垩世岩浆岩和构造活动的先前研究，本研究认为新特提斯板块的俯冲应是导致英武岭锡-钨矿床形成的原因。

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is whole-rock geochemistry data for granitic rocks typically obtained through XRF, ICP-MS, or another analytical method?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 花岗岩的整体岩石地球化学数据通常通过XRF、ICP-MS或其他分析方法获得。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the samples for zircon and cassiterite U-Pb dating collected from in the context of the Yingwuling pluton?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在Yingwuling岩体的背景下，锆石和锡石U-Pb定年的样品是从哪里收集的？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to obtain geochemical data from granitic rocks in the context of W-Sn mineralization studies?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于获取花岗岩中地球化学数据的数据收集方法的例子，以便在锡钨矿化研究中使用？
Example.AnswerEn: In the field of W-Sn mineralization studies, geochemical data from granitic rocks can be obtained using methods such as XRF for major elements, ICP-MS for trace elements, and LA-ICP-MS for in-situ zircon and cassiterite U-Pb isotopic analyses.
Example.AnswerCn: 在锡钨矿化研究领域，花岗岩的地球化学数据可以通过XRF获取主要元素，ICP-MS获取微量元素，以及LA-ICP-MS进行原位锆石和锡石的U-Pb同位素分析。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in determining the relationship between granitic magmatism and mineralization in geological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中，确定花岗岩岩浆活动与矿化之间关系时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge in determining the relationship between granitic magmatism and mineralization is the ongoing debate over the petrogenesis and metallogenic processes, which remain controversial due to a lack of detailed geochemical constraints and a need to revisit the tectonic environment.
Example.AnswerCn: 确定花岗岩岩浆作用与矿化之间关系的一个挑战是，关于岩石成因和矿产生成过程的持续争论，由于缺乏详细的地球化学约束以及需要重新审视构造环境，这些问题仍然存在争议。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of granitic rocks that are typically analyzed when studying W-Sn mineralization?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在研究铼-锡矿化时，通常分析花岗岩岩石的特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock geochemistry, Sr-Nd isotopes, zircon U-Pb ages, zircon Hf isotopes, cassiterite U-Pb ages
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩地球化学，Sr-Nd 同位素，锆石 U-Pb 年龄，锆石 Hf 同位素，锡石 U-Pb 年龄

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific attributes of zircon and cassiterite are measured in geochemical studies of the Yingwuling pluton?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在对鹰五岭岩体的地球化学研究中，测量锆石和锡石的具体属性包括哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: U-Pb ages, Hf isotopes, trace elements, U-Pb isotopic analyses
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: U-Pb年龄，Hf同位素，微量元素，U-Pb同位素分析

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to determine the age of granitic formations in relation to mineral deposits?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于确定花岗岩形成年龄与矿床关系的方法有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: zircon U-Pb dating, cassiterite U-Pb isotopic analyses using LA-ICP-MS
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb定年，锡石U-Pb同位素分析使用LA-ICP-MS。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the number of different granite types identified in the Yingwuling deposit study?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在英武岭矿床研究中识别出的不同花岗岩类型的数量是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many zircon samples were subjected to U-Pb dating in the Yingwuling pluton research?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在鹰乌岭岩体研究中，有多少个锆石样品进行了U-Pb定年？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the role of LA-ICP-MS in the collection of isotopic data for geological samples?
Definition.QuestionCn: LA-ICP-MS在地质样品同位素数据收集中的作用是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: LA-ICP-MS, or Laser Ablation Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry, is used for in-situ isotopic analysis, such as zircon and cassiterite U-Pb isotopic dating, providing precise age determination and micro-geochemical data from geological samples.
Definition.AnswerCn: LA-ICP-MS，即激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱，是用于原位同位素分析的技术，例如锆石和锡石的铀-铅同位素定年，能够提供精确的年龄测定和地质样品的微量地球化学数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with determining the tectonic environment in mineralization studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在矿化研究中，确定构造环境面临哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Challenges in determining the tectonic environment in mineralization studies include disputes over the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic settings, as well as the need for detailed geochemical constraints to clarify the metallogenic process and controlling factors.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在矿化研究中，确定构造环境的挑战包括关于花岗岩岩浆、矿化和构造背景之间关系的争议，以及需要详细的地球化学约束来阐明成矿过程和控制因素。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques for zircon U-Pb dating compare between the different granite types in the Yingwuling pluton?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在Yingwuling岩体中，不同花岗岩类型的锆石U-Pb定年数据收集技术如何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Zircon U-Pb dating was conducted on K-feldspar granite samples, biotite granite samples, and weathered ore-bearing granite residue samples. The process involved collecting samples from outcrops and drill holes, then crushing them before dating using LA-ICP-MS at the Key Laboratory of Mineralogy and Metallogeny, GIG-CAS.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 对K长石花岗岩样品、黑云母花岗岩样品和风化含矿花岗岩残留样品进行了锆石U-Pb定年。该过程涉及从露头和钻孔中采集样品，然后进行破碎，最后在中国科学院地质与地球物理研究所矿物学与成矿学重点实验室使用激光剥蚀-电感耦合等离子体质谱法进行定年。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the findings from the zircon U-Pb dating compare with those obtained from cassiterite U-Pb dating in terms of establishing the age of granitic magmatism and mineralization?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 锆石U-Pb定年与锡石U-Pb定年在确定花岗岩岩浆活动和矿化年龄方面的发现有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The findings from zircon U-Pb dating indicate an emplacement age of approximately 79 Ma for granitic magmatism, which aligns with the mineralization age of 79.6 ± 0.9 Ma obtained from cassiterite U-Pb dating. This suggests a genetic link between granitic magmatism and W-Sn mineralization.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb定年结果表明，花岗岩岩浆的成因年龄约为79百万年，这与从锡石U-Pb定年获得的矿化年龄79.6 ± 0.9百万年相一致。这表明花岗岩岩浆与钨-锡矿化之间存在遗传联系。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the combination of zircon and cassiterite U–Pb dating techniques infer about the temporal relationship between granitic magmatism and mineralization processes in geological studies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 锆石和锡石的U–Pb定年技术的结合可以推断出地质研究中花岗岩岩浆活动与矿化过程之间的时间关系。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The use of zircon and cassiterite U–Pb dating techniques provides an understanding of the temporal correlation between granitic magmatism and W–Sn mineralization, as demonstrated by the consistent emplacement age and mineralization age in the Yingwuling deposit.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 锆石和锡石的U–Pb定年技术提供了对花岗岩岩浆活动与钨–锡矿化之间时间相关性的理解，正如在鹰乌岭矿床中所示的那样，岩浆侵入年龄与矿化年龄一致。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do different geochemical analyses like Sr-Nd isotopes and Hf isotopes contribute to understanding the petrogenesis of granitic rocks and their associated mineral deposits?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同的地球化学分析，如锶-铷同位素和铪同位素，如何有助于理解花岗岩的成因及其相关矿床的形成？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Geochemical analyses such as Sr-Nd isotopes and Hf isotopes aid in elucidating the petrogenesis of granitic rocks by providing insights into the source characteristics and magmatic processes, which are crucial for understanding the relationship between granitic magmatism and W–Sn mineralization.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 地球化学分析，如锶-铷同位素和铪同位素，有助于阐明花岗岩的成因，通过提供对源特征和岩浆过程的洞察，这对于理解花岗岩岩浆活动与钨-锡矿化之间的关系至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors necessitate revisiting the tectonic environment in studies of W–Sn deposits in the Yingwuling area?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在对鹰舞岭地区的铅–锡矿床研究中，哪些因素需要重新审视构造环境？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Revisiting the tectonic environment is necessitated by the need to clarify the disputed relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting, and to better understand the role of the Neo-Tethys plate subduction in the formation of the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit during the Late Cretaceous.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 重新审视构造环境是为了澄清花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用和构造背景之间的争议关系，并更好地理解新特提斯板块俯冲在晚白垩世英武岭钨-锡矿床形成中的作用。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using multiple geochemical analysis techniques, such as XRF, ICP-MS, and LA-ICP-MS, on the reliability and comprehensiveness of geological datasets in the context of W-Sn mineralization studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在W-Sn矿化研究的背景下，使用多种地球化学分析技术，如XRF、ICP-MS和LA-ICP-MS，对地质数据集的可靠性和全面性可能产生的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using multiple geochemical analysis techniques can enhance the reliability and comprehensiveness of geological datasets by providing detailed information on major and trace elements, isotopic compositions, and precise dating. This allows for a more thorough understanding of the petrogenesis and mineralization processes, as seen in the geochemical data collected for the Yingwuling W–Sn deposit.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用多种地球化学分析技术可以增强地质数据集的可靠性和全面性，提供关于主要和微量元素、同位素组成以及精确年代测定的详细信息。这使得对岩石成因和矿化过程有更深入的理解，正如在对鹰五岭钨锡矿床收集的地球化学数据中所见。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the impact of lacking detailed geochemical constraints on the interpretation of tectonic environments and metallogenic processes in granitic-related W-Sn deposits?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 缺乏详细的地球化学约束对花岗岩相关的钨-锡矿床的构造环境和成矿过程的解释可能产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Lacking detailed geochemical constraints can lead to uncertainties in interpreting the tectonic environment and metallogenic processes, as it becomes challenging to determine the controlling factors of mineralization. This can result in disputed theories regarding the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting, which are crucial for understanding deposits like the Yingwuling W–Sn polymetallic deposit.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 缺乏详细的地球化学约束可能导致在解释构造环境和成矿过程时的不确定性，因为很难确定矿化的控制因素。这可能导致关于花岗岩岩浆、矿化和构造背景之间关系的理论争议，而这些对于理解像鹰乌岭钨-锡多金属矿床至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the rationale behind using LA-ICP-MS for zircon and cassiterite U-Pb isotopic analyses in geological studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在地质研究中使用LA-ICP-MS对锆石和锡石进行U-Pb同位素分析的理由是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: LA-ICP-MS is used for zircon and cassiterite U-Pb isotopic analyses due to its capability to provide precise dating of mineral ages, which is crucial for determining the emplacement age of granitic rocks and the timing of mineralization events. This helps establish a genetic link between granitic magmatism and W-Sn mineralization.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: LA-ICP-MS被用于锆石和锡石的U-Pb同位素分析，因为它能够提供矿物年龄的精确测定，这对于确定花岗岩的成岩年龄和矿化事件的时间至关重要。这有助于建立花岗岩岩浆活动与钨-锡矿化之间的遗传联系。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to revisit the tectonic environment and the factors controlling the metallogenic process in the context of W-Sn deposits?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么在W-Sn矿床的背景下，有必要重新审视构造环境和控制成矿过程的因素？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Revisiting the tectonic environment and the factors controlling the metallogenic process is necessary as the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting remains disputed. Detailed geochemical constraints are required to clarify the petrogenesis and metallogenic processes, which remain controversial in the study of W-Sn deposits.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 重新审视构造环境和控制成矿过程的因素是必要的，因为花岗岩岩浆、矿化和构造背景之间的关系仍然存在争议。需要详细的地球化学约束来阐明岩石生成和成矿过程，这在锡钨矿床的研究中仍然存在争议。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What process is involved in collecting U-Pb isotopic data from zircon and cassiterite minerals to understand the petrogenesis and mineralization in granitic systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 收集锆石和锡石矿物的U-Pb同位素数据以了解花岗岩系统中的岩石成因和矿化过程涉及哪些步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: U-Pb isotopic data from zircon and cassiterite minerals are collected using LA-ICP-MS analysis. Zircon U-Pb dating is conducted on samples of K-feldspar granite and biotite granite, while cassiterite U-Pb isotopic analyses are performed on smooth domains with no cracks, using the same LA-ICP-MS instrument.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）分析收集锆石和锡石矿物的U-Pb同位素数据。对K长石花岗岩和黑云母花岗岩样品进行锆石U-Pb定年，而锡石U-Pb同位素分析则在没有裂缝的光滑区域进行，使用相同的LA-ICP-MS仪器。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are used to ensure the accuracy and reliability of Hf isotopic data obtained from zircon minerals in granitic rocks?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保从花岗岩中的锆石矿物获得的铪同位素数据的准确性和可靠性的方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The accuracy and reliability of Hf isotopic data from zircon minerals are ensured by conducting in-situ analyses using LA-MC-ICP-MS. This method allows for precise measurement of Hf isotopic compositions directly from the zircon samples, which are selected from K-feldspar granite and biotite granite.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 通过使用激光剥蚀多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-MC-ICP-MS）进行原位分析，确保了锆石矿物中铪同位素数据的准确性和可靠性。这种方法允许直接从选自钾长石花岗岩和黑云母花岗岩的锆石样品中精确测量铪同位素组成。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enabled the in-depth geochemical analysis of granitic rocks and associated minerals in the context of the Yingwuling W-Sn deposit?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法论使得对Yingwuling W-Sn矿床中的花岗岩岩石及相关矿物进行了深入的地球化学分析？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies involving XRF, ICP-MS, LA-ICP-MS, and MC-ICP-MS enabled the geochemical analysis of granitic rocks and associated minerals, providing insights into whole-rock major and trace elements, isotopic compositions, and U-Pb dating.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 涉及XRF、ICP-MS、LA-ICP-MS和MC-ICP-MS的方法学使得花岗岩及其相关矿物的地球化学分析成为可能，提供了关于整体岩石主要和微量元素、同位素组成以及U-Pb定年的见解。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or resources are necessary to effectively carry out U-Pb isotopic dating and geochemical analyses on granite samples from mineral deposits?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 有效进行矿床花岗岩样品的U-Pb同位素定年和地球化学分析所需的条件或资源是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Effective U-Pb isotopic dating and geochemical analyses require well-preserved sample sites, advanced analytical instruments like LA-ICP-MS, and access to specialized laboratories such as the Key Laboratory of Mineralogy and Metallogeny.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 有效的U-Pb同位素定年和地球化学分析需要保存良好的样品地点、先进的分析仪器如激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS），以及访问专门实验室如矿物学与成矿学重点实验室。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the relationship between granitic magma and mineralization in W-Sn deposits still remain disputed despite the availability of geochemical datasets?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 尽管有可用的地球化学数据集，花岗岩岩浆与钨-锡矿床矿化之间的关系仍然可能存在争议，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting remains disputed due to the controversial petrogenesis and metallogenic process, as well as the unclear controlling factors of the metallogenic process, which are not fully constrained by geochemical data.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用和构造背景之间的关系仍然存在争议，这主要是由于岩石成因和矿产生成过程的争议，以及矿产生成过程的控制因素不明确，这些因素尚未通过地球化学数据得到充分约束。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why are certain isotopic analyses, like zircon Hf isotopes, crucial for understanding the petrogenesis of plutons in the context of W-Sn deposits?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 某些同位素分析，如锆石铪同位素，对于理解与钨-锡矿床相关的岩体的成因至关重要。
Expectation.AnswerEn: Zircon Hf isotopes, alongside U-Pb ages and whole-rock geochemistry, are crucial for understanding the petrogenesis of plutons because they help clarify the genetic link between granitic magmatism and mineralization, as well as the tectonic settings responsible for the deposits.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 锆石Hf同位素、U-Pb年龄和全岩地球化学对于理解岩体的成因至关重要，因为它们有助于阐明花岗岩岩浆活动与矿化之间的遗传联系，以及导致这些矿床的构造背景。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might researchers face in using LA-ICP-MS for cassiterite U-Pb dating in W-Sn mineralization research?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在使用LA-ICP-MS进行锡石U-Pb定年时，在钨-锡矿化研究中可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in using LA-ICP-MS for cassiterite U-Pb dating may include ensuring accurate isotopic analyses on smooth domains without cracks and addressing the lack of detailed geochemical constraints on the controlling factors of the metallogenic process.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 使用LA-ICP-MS进行锡石U-Pb定年面临的挑战包括确保在光滑的无裂纹区域进行准确的同位素分析，以及解决对成矿过程控制因素缺乏详细地球化学约束的问题。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using LA-ICP-MS for both zircon and cassiterite U-Pb dating in geological studies of W-Sn deposits?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估在W-Sn矿床的地质研究中使用LA-ICP-MS对锆石和锡石进行U-Pb定年的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of LA-ICP-MS for zircon and cassiterite U-Pb dating appears to be highly effective in providing accurate emplacement ages for granites and mineralization ages for W-Sn deposits. This dual application allows for a detailed understanding of the genetic link between granitic magmatism and mineralization.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: LA-ICP-MS在锆石和锡石U-Pb定年中的应用似乎非常有效，可以为花岗岩的成因年龄和钨锡矿床的矿化年龄提供准确的测定。这种双重应用使我们能够详细了解花岗岩岩浆活动与矿化之间的遗传联系。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways could the integration of additional geochemical constraints enhance the understanding of metallogenic processes in W-Sn deposits?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 额外地球化学约束的整合可以通过以下几种方式增强对铼-锡矿床成矿过程的理解：
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating additional geochemical constraints, such as detailed trace element analysis and fluid inclusion studies, could provide deeper insights into the physicochemical conditions of ore formation and the sources of mineralizing fluids, thus clarifying the controlling factors of metallogenic processes in W-Sn deposits.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合额外的地球化学约束，例如详细的微量元素分析和流体包裹体研究，可以为矿石形成的物理化学条件及矿化流体的来源提供更深入的见解，从而阐明钨-锡矿床成矿过程的控制因素。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges faced in establishing the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting in the context of the Yingwuling W-Sn deposit.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在建立花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用和构造背景之间关系时所面临的挑战，以迎乌岭钨-锡矿床为例。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges included disputes over the relationship among granitic magma, mineralization, and tectonic setting, as well as controversial petrogenesis and metallogenic processes. The tectonic environment needed revisiting, and controlling factors of the metallogenic process were unclear due to a lack of detailed geochemical constraints.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括花岗岩岩浆、矿化作用和构造背景之间关系的争议，以及有争议的成因和成矿过程。构造环境需要重新审视，而成矿过程的控制因素由于缺乏详细的地球化学约束而不明确。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore potential datasets or research approaches that could address the unclear controlling factors of the metallogenic process in W-Sn mineralization associated with granitic magmatism.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探索潜在的数据集或研究方法，以解决与花岗岩岩浆作用相关的钨-锡矿化过程中不明确的控制因素。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets or research approaches could involve detailed geochemical analyses using advanced isotopic methods, expanding sampling to include a wider range of granitoid types, and integrating tectonic history data. Comprehensive petrogenetic models incorporating these datasets could clarify the metallogenic processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集或研究方法可以涉及使用先进同位素方法进行详细的地球化学分析，扩大采样范围以包括更广泛的花岗岩类型，并整合构造历史数据。综合这些数据集的成因模型可以阐明成矿过程。
